On 15 Oct, Eric Vought wrote:
> The FAQ posting/welcome message I talked about in my last message should
> tell people how to configure their mail agent to not send twelve billion
> attachments and 20 lines of font information ...
> 

I don't remember what the original welcome message is but I know that on
news:comp.lang.tcl, when you post the first time, you get a _long_ message
with a whole bunch of links and information that new Tcl users can search
before asking questions on the newsgroup. Maybe someone has the time to come
up with such an automatic message, when new users subscribe.

L

-- 
Laurent Duperval <mailto:lduperval@...>
